title: Install 0.36
body:
Thanx for the excellent package. Somehow I cannot install 0.36 version. The 0.35 worked perfectly for me. According to the documentation there seems to some interesting new features in this new 0.36 version. I would definitely like to test them. After installation, I got the following error messages.  Attached, I print also my Python and OS versions.


import sys
import platform 
print(sys.platform)
print(platform.version())
print(sys.version_info)
import shap

win32
10.0.19041
sys.version_info(major=3, minor=6, micro=10, releaselevel='final', serial=0)

ImportError Traceback (most recent call last) < ipython-input-1-1139cee11c9a> in < module>
      4 print(platform.version())
      5 print(sys.version_info)
----> 6 import shap



~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\shap\__init__.py in < module>
     10     warnings.warn("As of version 0.29.0 shap only supports Python 3 (not 2)!")
     11 
---> 12 from ._explanation import Explanation
     13 
     14 # explainers

~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\shap\_explanation.py in < module>
      6 import warnings
      7 import copy
----> 8 from slicer import Slicer, Alias
      9 # from ._order import Order
     10 from .utils._general import OpChain

ImportError: cannot import name 'Alias'

This is what happens, when I use 0.35 version, installed via conda i.e. all works. After conda install pip install does not allow me to upgrade shap.

import sys
import platform 
print(sys.platform)
print(platform.version())
print(sys.version_info)
import shap

win32
10.0.19041
sys.version_info(major=3, minor=6, micro=10, releaselevel='final', serial=0)
print(shap.__version__)
0.35.0
